name: Our Summers
description:
🌻 "I would run out of words before I could tell you all the reasons why I love you (they did say I had to keep it under 1000)"🌻

Will 1000 words be enough? Stroll down memory lane with Higre in these 10 summer snapshots, and find out.

From meeting by chance to falling desperately in love, what kind of indelible memories have these 10 years etched into Higre's heart?

(This game is a Her Choice extra and features canonical characters and events. It is standalone and requires no prior knowledge about the main game or game universe.)

A game made for 02A2 - Visual Novel Jam

  • 1 week
  • 1000 words
  • 1 illustration
  • 1 music track
  • 1 voice actor

A typical playthrough takes around 10 minutes.

Known issues:

- you might experience lag during the puzzle segments when running the game in Mozilla. We recommend switching to Chrome for a smoother experience.

- you can run the game on mobile but won't be able to access the options outside of the main menu
